message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less.  Would you be willing to go down to $125?
I understand that you're looking to negotiate, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
